tgt_original: jñānajyotirvirocana iti jagatpradīpa iti sūryapratibhāsaḥ |  jñānolkā iti  rāhupratibhāsaḥ |
nāmābhiṣekaḥ ṣaṣṭhaḥ | ( se ṭī , pṛ 21 )  nimittam  aparaṃ  jvālādibinduparyantaṃ ṣaḍanyannimittaṃ māyājāle samādhipaṭale proktaṃ bhagavatā  | tadyathā -

vairocano mahādīptirjñānajyotirvirocanaḥ ||  jagatpradīpo jñānolko mahātejāḥ prabhāsvaraḥ |  vidyārājogramantreśo mantrarājo mahārthakṛt ||  iti gāthādvayena māyājāle'paranimittaṃ  bhagavatoktaṃ sandhyābhāṣāntareṇa |  pūrvoktānnirabhragaganād bhavati pratibhāso
